thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend stay
thread.title_full: Weekend stay - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kevin S
title: Weekend stay
text: Really good service from staff, larger than expected room size, good bathroom facilities, comfy bed, unexpectedly peaceful location. Only negative comment would be the lack of on-demand films in our room (not really an issue as we just watched live TV), It seemed that this was once an option, so perhaps just not available in our room. Didn't ask staff to rectify it as I was not that bothered.
